sect2.title: Installation of Man
sect2.para: Run the following commands to install man:

screen.userinput: for i in configure src/Makefile.in src/makewhatis.sh do cp $i $i.backup && sed 's/gawk/awk/g' $i > tmp~ && mv tmp~ $i done && chmod 755 configure && ./configure -default && make && make install

sect2.para: You may want to take a look at the man hint at &hints-root;man.txt which deals with formatting and compression issues for man pages.
